Ayane walked over to an object covered in a tarp. "For years you've been the attention grabbing girl while I've been overlooked, but that's going to change." sneered Ayane. "Once I flip this switch, the machine will produce all sorts of food into you while forcing you to chew." grinned Ayane. With a locked jaw, Konari could only muffle as Ayane activated the machine.

The feeder started to turn gears and food began rolling down the conveyor belt. Konari was forced to chew everything that came down. She squirmed in vain for food kept coming and Konari was forced to consume it all, becoming fatter and fatter. Gazing upon her best friend's rolls of cascading fat, her cellulite ridden limbs, her colossal boobs spilling out of her taut uniform filled Konari with a peculiar fascination. Konari than pondered what is was to be fat even more important what Kai would think. Suzu's boyfriend like fat girls, the thought of Kai being an FA appeared logical.

"Suzu, could you help me get as fat as you?" Konari asked.

"Huh, really, I'm like 500 pounds Konari." Suzu replied. "Why would you want to be fat? So you could eat whatever you wanted?"

"You just look so good." reasoned the enamored catgirl.

"Thanks Konari but it took alot of work to become 500pounds." Suzu informed the aspiring gainer.

"It can't be that hard, I mean you probably just sat around and ate alot, right." Konari guessed.

"Yeah but I had to eat alot of fatty foods. At first my boyfriend force fed me to get me fat which I hated at first but as I gained, I grew to like it." Suzu said.

Konari paused for a few seconds before answering "Let's do it. Suzu I want you to force feed me."

Suzu then...
